name: Sender & Receiver
description:
Hello everyone! This right here is my entry for the GDL Anniversary Jam, it is also my first entry to any Game Jam ever. In Sender & Receiver you controll 2 ships, the sender and the receiver and solve levels with the interaction between those two.

You controll the sender and the receiver one after another until you reached your goal, if a enemy is struck by your beam, they are in ... Double Trouble. 

Controlls :

  • WASD to Move
  • Q to switch between sender and receiver
  • E to fire a beam
